# filterConfiguration

**Instance Property**

An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterProviderConfiguration] object containing the current filter configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
var filterConfiguration: NEFilterProviderConfiguration { get }
```

## Discussion

The Filter Provider can observe this property to be notified when the configuration changes, using KVO. See [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/KeyValueObserving/KeyValueObserving.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000177i].
title: filterConfiguration
